name: Coincidence
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 37
Link:http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Game description:
Will you ever get out of this prison cell? Well... you can certainly try.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
WASD, mouse, E to Interact
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dev commentary:
I mainly focused on creating a good visual feeling. Game usually tells you exactly what you need to do so it`s more of a short story than an adventure game.

Don`t forget to explore the cell and see what your character has to say about different things during different days.

Thanks for stopping by! :)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Technical stuff:
-Game was created in Unity3D.
-Programmed in C#.
-Models were created in Blender.
-Sound effects generated via BFXR.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
